11#ifndef MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_LAG_AGGREGATOR_H_
12#define MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_LAG_AGGREGATOR_H_
13
14#include <vector>
15
16#include "absl/types/optional.h"
17#include "api/audio/echo_canceller3_config.h"
18#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/delay_estimate.h"
19#include "modules/audio_processing/aec3/matched_filter.h"
20
21namespace webrtc {
22
23class ApmDataDumper;
24
25// Aggregates lag estimates produced by the MatchedFilter class into a single
26// reliable combined lag estimate.
27class MatchedFilterLagAggregator {
28 public:
29 MatchedFilterLagAggregator(
30 ApmDataDumper* data_dumper,
31 size_t max_filter_lag,
32 const EchoCanceller3Config::Delay::DelaySelectionThresholds& thresholds);
33
34 MatchedFilterLagAggregator() = delete;
35 MatchedFilterLagAggregator(const MatchedFilterLagAggregator&) = delete;
36 MatchedFilterLagAggregator& operator=(const MatchedFilterLagAggregator&) =
37 delete;
38
39 ~MatchedFilterLagAggregator();
40
41 // Resets the aggregator.
42 void Reset(bool hard_reset);
43
44 // Aggregates the provided lag estimates.
45 absl::optional<DelayEstimate> Aggregate(
46 rtc::ArrayView<const MatchedFilter::LagEstimate> lag_estimates);
47
48 // Returns whether a reliable delay estimate has been found.
49 bool ReliableDelayFound() const { return significant_candidate_found_; }
50
51 private:
52 ApmDataDumper* const data_dumper_;
53 std::vector<int> histogram_;
54 std::array<int, 250> histogram_data_;
55 int histogram_data_index_ = 0;
56 bool significant_candidate_found_ = false;
57 const EchoCanceller3Config::Delay::DelaySelectionThresholds thresholds_;
58};
59} // namespace webrtc
60
61#endif // MODULES_AUDIO_PROCESSING_AEC3_MATCHED_FILTER_LAG_AGGREGATOR_H_
62
